item.title: 瑞典央行下调政策利率 警惕经济疲软
item.description: 瑞典中央银行周三将其关键政策利率从预期的2.50%下调至2.25%，以促进疲软的经济增长，并表示其对利率的预测保持不变，但随时准备在价格和活动前景发生变化时采取行动。【原文：Sweden's central bank cut its key policy rate to 2.25% from 2.50% as expected on Wednesday to boost sluggish economic growth and said its forecast for interest rates held though it stood ready to act if the outlook for prices and activity changed.】

item.title: 日本将与贝森特就外汇和其他问题进行合作
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信（Katsunobu Kato）和美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三举行视频电话会议后表示，双方将在外汇等问题上开展合作。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato and U.S. Treasury secretary Scott Bessent will cooperate on issues including forex, Kato said on Wednesday, following a video conference call between the two officials.】

item.title: ASML 盈利强劲提振科技股，欧股再创新高
item.description: 周三，欧洲股市攀升至历史新高，芯片设备制造商 ASML 在公布强劲的季度业绩后带领科技股走高。【原文：European shares climbed a record high on Wednesday, as chip equipment maker ASML led technology stocks higher after reporting strong quarterly results.】

item.title: 雷诺和沃尔沃电动货车部门赢得新订单
item.description: 雷诺和沃尔沃汽车制造商与达飞轮船管理集团（CMA CGM）的合资企业 Flexis 周二表示，已收到 10 家欧洲运输和配送公司的意向书，订购其 15,000 辆新型电动厢式货车。【原文：Flexis, a joint venture between automakers Renault and Volvo as well as shipper CMA CGM, said on Tuesday it has received letters of intent from 10 European transport and distribution companies for orders of 15,000 units of its new electric van.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金因科技繁荣创下 2,220 亿美元的年度利润纪录
item.description: 在去年科技股大涨的推动下，挪威 1.8 万亿美元的主权财富基金--世界上最大的主权财富基金--周三公布，其年度利润达到创纪录的 2.51 万亿挪威克朗（约合 2220 亿美元）。【原文：Norway's $1.8 trillion sovereign wealth fund, the world's largest, reported on Wednesday a record annual profit of 2.51 trillion crowns ($222 billion), driven by last year's tech rally.】

item.title: 英伟达股价跳涨，在与 DeepSeek 有关的下跌后反弹
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）股票周三在欧洲跳涨，表明这家处于人工智能市场繁荣核心的公司股价在本周因中国 DeepSeek 人工智能工具崛起而暴跌后可能进一步回升。【原文：Nvidia stock jumped in Europe on Wednesday, suggesting shares in the company at the heart of the artificial intelligence markets boom may recover further after a steep drop this week triggered by the rise of China's DeepSeek AI tool.】

item.title: 预订强劲，ASML 股价大涨
item.description: 周三，ASML 股价在法兰克福早盘交易中大幅上涨，此前该公司的季度业绩表现强劲。【原文：ASML shares rose sharply in early Frankfurt trading on Wednesday following strong quarterly bookings.】

item.title: 销售增长乏力，LVMH 集团股价下跌
item.description: 周三，LVMH 集团股价在法兰克福早盘交易中下跌，原因是该奢侈品集团公布的销售增长未能给投资者留下深刻印象，而在此之前，该集团的竞争对手接连发布强劲业绩，且近期股价上涨。【原文：Shares in LVMH fell in early Frankfurt trading on Wednesday, as sales growth posted by the luxury goods group failed to impress investors, following a string of strong results from rivals and recent price gains.】

item.title: 据《德国商报》报道，大众汽车考虑在美国为奥迪和保时捷品牌建立生产基地
item.description: 据《德国商报》（Handelsblatt）周三报道，德国汽车制造商大众汽车正考虑在美国为其高端品牌奥迪和保时捷建立生产基地，以避免受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁征收关税的影响。【原文：German carmaker Volkswagen is considering setting up production sites in the United States for its high-end Audi and Porsche brands to avert fallout from tariffs threatened by President Donald Trump, Handelsblatt reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 由于中国市场恶化，雷米预计全年销售额降幅将在低位徘徊
item.description: 人头马君度集团周三表示，目前预计 2024/25 财年全年集团销售额的有机降幅将接近 18%，处于指导目标的下限，原因是美国需求复苏的时间尚不明朗，中国市场状况也在恶化。【原文：Remy Cointreau said on Wednesday it now expected the decline in full year 2024/25 group sales to be close to 18% on an organic basis, at the lower end of its guidance target, citing lack of visibility on the timing of a recovery in demand in the United States and worsening market conditions in China.】

item.title: 卡车制造商沃尔沃第四季度利润降幅超过预期，但提高了股息
item.description: 瑞典卡车制造商沃尔沃公司（AB Volvo）周三公布的第四季度营业利润降幅大于预期，但提高了股息支付额。【原文：Swedish truckmaker AB Volvo reported on Wednesday a larger drop than expected in fourth-quarter operating profit but raised its dividend payout.】

item.title: ASML 报告称，由于对先进芯片制造工具的需求，预订量大幅上升
item.description: 最大的计算机芯片制造设备供应商 ASML 周三公布，第四季度预订额为 70.88 亿欧元（73.9 亿美元），远好于预期，原因是对其用于制造人工智能芯片的最先进工具的需求强劲。【原文：ASML , the biggest supplier of computer chip-making equipment, on Wednesday reported much better than expected fourth-quarter bookings of 7.088 billion euros ($7.39 billion), on strong demand for its most advanced tools, which are used to make chips used in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 顶级投资者质疑帝亚吉欧的增长目标
item.description: 帝亚吉欧的新任财务总监尼克-贾汉阿尼（Nik Jhangiani）面临着压力，他将在下周回调该烈酒巨头的中期销售目标，一些投资者认为，鉴于整个行业的销售下滑，中期销售目标可能不再现实。【原文：Diageo's new finance chief Nik Jhangiani is under pressure to row back on the spirits giant's medium-term sales goals next week, which some investors say may no longer be realistic given sliding sales across the sector.】

item.title: 增长引擎还是赌场？全球投资者重新思考中国模式
item.description: 历史上曾对中国经济发展下过赌注的全球投资者正在放弃长期繁荣的宏大叙事，转而采取更为温和的观点，将中国市场视为小赌怡情、快速回报的机会。【原文：Global investors who have historically bet on China's economic development are ditching grand narratives of long-term prosperity and instead adopting more modest views that see the market as an opportunity for smaller bets with quicker payoffs.】

item.title: 欧洲 科技神经为 Mag 7 财报及时平复
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 阿里巴巴发布号称超越 DeepSeek-V3 的人工智能模型
item.description: 这家中国科技公司发布了新版 Qwen 2.5 人工智能模型，并声称该模型超越了备受赞誉的 DeepSeek-V3。【原文：The Chinese tech company released a new version of its Qwen 2.5 artificial intelligence model that it claimed surpassed the highly acclaimed DeepSeek-V3.】

item.title: 美国太阳能集团寻求大规模扩建储能设施
item.description: 一个美国太阳能行业组织周三公布了一项积极的目标，即在 2030 年前部署大量的储能设备，以帮助可再生能源为电力需求旺盛的客户提供服务。【原文：A U.S. solar industry group on Wednesday unveiled an aggressive goal to deploy vast amounts of energy storage capacity by 2030 to help renewables serve power-hungry customers.】

item.title: 会议记录显示，黑田的 "火箭筒 "在扩大规模时已在日本央行内部失去拥趸
item.description: 据周三公布的一份完整的审议记录显示，一些日本央行决策者在前行长黑田东彦的 "火箭筒 "刺激政策推出不到两年后就开始对其威力失去信心，他们以 5 比 4 的微弱票数决定在 2014 年加大该计划的力度。【原文：Some Bank of Japan policymakers began to lose faith in the power of former Governor Haruhiko Kuroda's "bazooka" stimulus less than two years after its introduction, with a decision to ramp up the programme in 2014 made by a narrow 5-4 vote, according to a full account of the deliberations released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Sigma 股东批准 55 亿澳元的 Chemist Warehouse 合并案
item.description: 澳大利亚 Sigma Healthcare 公司股东周三投票通过了与 Chemist Warehouse 公司的合并案，合并后将成为一家价值 88 亿澳元（55.0 亿美元）的药房和零售巨头。【原文：Australia's Sigma Healthcare shareholders approved in a vote on Wednesday a merger with Chemist Warehouse to create an A$8.8 billion ($5.50 billion) pharmacy and retailing giant.】

item.title: 苹果 iPhone 将在美国支持 Starlink 直接对蜂窝网络覆盖
item.description: 据该计划的合作伙伴 T-Mobile 称，苹果公司的 iPhone 设备现在有资格测试 SpaceX 旗下 Starlink 的直达蜂窝功能，该功能可从太空提供覆盖。【原文：Apple's iPhone devices are now eligible to test SpaceX-owned Starlink's direct-to-cell capability that provides coverage from space, according to T-Mobile , a partner in the program.】

item.title: 台湾或将为应对特朗普关税威胁的工业提供帮助
item.description: 台湾省总理赵政泰周三表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁对半导体征收关税，台湾政府将很快研究是否需要帮助国内产业。【原文：Taiwan's government will soon look at whether it needs to help its domestic industry over threats by U.S. President Donald Trump to put tariffs on semiconductors, Premier Cho Jung-tai said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚敦促公民谨慎使用中国人工智能模型 DeepSeek
item.description: 澳大利亚财长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）周三敦促澳大利亚人在使用中国人工智能模型 DeepSeek 时要谨慎，这是澳大利亚政府对使用该模型发出的最新警告。【原文：Australia Treasurer Jim Chalmers on Wednesday urged Australians to be cautious when using Chinese AI model DeepSeek, the latest government to warn over its use.】

item.title: 投资者权衡特朗普关税影响，油价保持稳定
item.description: 油价周三趋于稳定，因为投资者权衡了美国可能对加拿大和墨西哥进口商品征收关税的影响，同时基本摆脱了美国每周原油库存增加的影响。【原文：Oil prices steadied on Wednesday as investors weighed the impact of potential U.S. tariffs on Canadian and Mexican imports, while largely shrugging off an increase in U.S. weekly crude inventory.】

item.title: DeepSeek 担忧缓解，亚洲科技股反弹
item.description: 科技股周三领涨亚太股市，追随隔夜华尔街股市的涨势，因为投资者对中国出现低成本人工智能模式的忧虑有所缓解，一些人认为这种模式可与美国在该行业的主导地位相抗衡。【原文：Technology stocks led gains in Asia-Pacific markets on Wednesday, tracking advances on Wall Street overnight as investor angst ebbed over the emergence of a low-cost Chinese AI model that some see rivalling U.S. dominance of the industry.】

item.title: 索尼集团称社长户木将从四月起兼任首席执行官一职
item.description: 索尼公司周三表示，索尼集团总裁户木宏树将从 4 月 1 日起兼任首席执行官一职，而现任董事长兼首席执行官吉田宪一郎将继续担任董事长。【原文：Sony Group President Hiroki Totoki will add the CEO role from April 1, while incumbent Chairman-CEO Kenichiro Yoshida will remain as chairman, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国着手废除拜登政府的汽车燃油经济性标准
item.description: 美国新任交通部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）周二签署了一项命令，指示美国监管机构废除乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统时期颁布的具有里程碑意义的燃油经济性标准，该标准旨在大幅降低汽车和卡车的燃油消耗。【原文：New U.S. Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy signed an order on Tuesday directing U.S. regulators to rescind landmark fuel economy standards issued under President Joe Biden that aim to drastically reduce fuel use for cars and trucks.】

item.title: 星巴克的 Niccol 旨在驯服连锁店的移动订单洪流
item.description: 星巴克新任首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）的愿景是把星巴克打造成一家经典的咖啡馆，但他不得不面对一个不同寻常的挑战：星巴克的移动订单既具有颠覆性，又很受欢迎。【原文：Starbucks' new CEO, Brian Niccol, has a vision to make Starbucks into a classic coffeehouse, but he has to contend with an unusual challenge: the company's mobile orders are as disruptive as they are popular.】

item.title: OpenAI 表示将与美国政府合作保护技术
item.description: ChatGPT 的创建者 OpenAI 周二表示，中国公司正 "不断 "试图利用美国竞争对手来改进中国的人工智能模型。【原文：ChatGPT creator OpenAI said on Tuesday said that Chinese firms are "constantly" trying to tap into U.S. rivals to improve Chinese artificial intelligence models.】

item.title: 雀巢公司总裁表示将在三年内在墨西哥投资 10 亿美元
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）周二表示，包装食品公司雀巢将在未来三年内在墨西哥投资 10 亿美元，以提高各种产品的产量。【原文：Packaged food company Nestle will invest $1 billion in Mexico over the next three years to boost production of various products, Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 汇丰加倍押注亚洲，全球品牌岌岌可危
item.description: 汇丰银行董事长马克-塔克（Mark Tucker）在北京一张宽大的会议桌前对着麦克风，对英国商界领袖和中国高级官员说，他代表在场的所有英国企业希望加强经济联系。【原文：HSBC Chairman Mark Tucker leaned into the microphone at a vast conference table in Beijing, telling British business leaders and senior Chinese officials that he spoke for all UK businesses present in hoping for stronger economic ties.】
